title: Instruction File Frontmatter Schema
description: Frontmatter schema for .instructions.md files per VS Code Copilot specification

description.description: A short description of the instructions file

name.description: The name of the instructions file, used in the UI. If not specified, the file name is used.

applyTo.description: Optional glob pattern that defines which files the instructions should be applied to automatically, relative to the workspace root. Use ** to apply to all files. If not specified, instructions are not applied automatically.
